TextView.android:text:
You may enter additional comments about this request by clicking in the white text area. A keyboard will then appear. Use the back button on your device to close the keyboard. 
 
If your Android device supports it, you may press the microphone icon on the keyboard to voice record your comments. 
 
You can change the status of this request with the radio buttons at the bottom of the screen. 
 
Press "Save Changes" when you are finished. You can also press the back button to cancel any changes and return to the previous screen.
